Michael Bengwayan bụ onye na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi na Philippines nke a maara nke ọma maka nkwado ya nke iji Petroleum nut (Pittosporum resiniferum) dị ka ihe ọzọ bio-fuel na Philippines, yana itinye aka na nkwado iji chekwaa osisi ka a ghara igbu ya, ọkachasị Save 182 Movement nke rịọrọ ka a kwụsị osisi 182 na-agba ala na Luneta Hill, Baguio, site n'aka ụlọ ahịa SM, na mkpọsa iji kwụsị igbu osisi 1,200 n'okporo ụzọ Manila, n'obodo Bonaninal na Poasrubio.

Bengwayan bụ onye isi ụlọ ọrụ Cordillera Ecological Center, ma bụrụkwa onye nwe The Habitat, ugbo hectare ise dị na Tublay, Benguet nke na-ejekwa ozi dị ka saịtị ebe obibi, ebe nchekwa gburugburu ebe obibi nwere osisi ụmụ amaala Philippine Cordillera, yana  ugbo ngosi maka igbanye kọfị Arabica, painiapulu, osisi pine, na mmanụ.
